chapter.text: akhanda va evanu labana sulam mata divuramin
dædi lesa hamana sæda sulam mata divuramin
(valavan) visiruva harina sulam mata divuramin
ven ven va ven karana dæ mata divuramin
menehi kirimak vasayen (hadavatata) helana dæ mata divuramin
(ema menehi kirima) samavak vasayen nætahot avavadayak vasayen ho pavati
niyata vasayenma numbalata pratigna denu labana dæ siduvannaki
taru ehi alokaya maka damanu labana vita
tavada ahasa pupura harinu labana vita
kandu duvili bavata pat karanu labana vita
tavada dharma dutavarun ek ræs karanu labana vita
kavara dinayak sandaha meya kal damanu ladde da
(eya) viniscaya dinaya sandahaya
viniscaya dinaya yanu kumakdæyi numbata dænum dunne kumak da
boru kalavunata edina vinasayayi
mula sitiyavun api vinasa nokalemu da
pasu va api ovun samaga pasu pæminiyavun da anugamanaya kalemu
aparadhakaruvanta api sidu karanuye elesaya
boru kalavunata edina vinasayayi
ita pahat vu dravanayakin api numbala nomævvemu da
evita araksita sthanayaka api eya tænpat kalemu
niyamita kala paricchedayak dakva
esema apima eya niyama kalemu. eheyin api niyama karannangen visistayan vemu
boru kalavunata edina vinasayayi
mahapolova pramanavat lesa api pat nokalemu da
jivat vannanta ha malavunta
tavada ehi api us kandu mudun æti kalemu. tavada imihiri jalayada pevvemu
boru kalavunata edina vinasayayi
numbala kavara deyak boru karamin sitiye da e vetata numbala gaman karanu
sakha tunakin samanvita hevana veta gaman karanu
eya hevana laba dennak lesin næta. emenma eya gini dællen araksa karannak da noveyi
niyata vasayenma eya maliga men (usata) darunu lesa gini dæl helayi
eya kaha pæhæti otu ramcuvak men pavati
boru kalavunata edina vinasayayi
eya ovun kata nokarana dinayaki
ovun nidahasata karunu idiripat kirima sandaha ovunata anumætiya denu nolæbe
boru kalavunata edina vinasayayi
meya viniscaye dinayayi. api numbala ha mutun mittan ek ræs kalemu
eheyin numbalata yam kumantranayak tibe nam numbala mata kumantranaya karanu
boru kalavunata edina vinasayayi
niyata vasayenma biya bætimatun hevana ha ulpat atara veti
tavada ovun asa karana palaturu atara da (veti)
numbala sidu karamin siti dæ hetuven numbala sæpase anubhava karanu. tavada panaya karanu (yæyi kiyanu læbe)
niyata vasayenma melesaya api dæhæmiyanta pratiphala pirinamanuye
boru kalavunata edina vinasayayi
numbala anubhava karanu. tavada mada kalak bhukti vindinu. niyata vasayenma numbala aparadhakaruvanya
boru kalavunata edina vinasayayi
(melovehi) ovunata (danin allamin nævi) rukuu karannæyi pavasanu labana vita ovuhu rukuu nokarati
boru kalavunata edina vinasayayi
min pasu va ovun visvasa karanuye kavara prakasayak da
